image_metadata.caption: "I wrote 20 short programs in Python yesterday. It was wonderful. Perl, I'm leaving you." (Image courtesy of Randall Munroe, creator of the [xkcd](http://xkcd.com/) webcomic; this particular image can be found [here](http://xkcd.com/353/).)
image_metadata.image-alt: Comic strip showing how easy it is to do anything in Python, even fly.
